member.name: T:JoshSB.JoshSB
member.summary: An extension I made which adds functions I regularly use and some new ones into the language

member.name: M:JoshSB.JoshSB.isEven(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Checks if a specified value is even
member.returns: True if the value is even

member.name: M:JoshSB.JoshSB.isOdd(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Checks if a specified value is odd
member.returns: True if the number is odd

member.name: P:JoshSB.JoshSB.CurrentUser
member.summary: Gets the user name of the person who is currently logged on to the Windows operating system
member.returns: The user name of the person who is currently logged on to the Windows operating system.

member.name: P:JoshSB.JoshSB.WorkingDir
member.summary: Gets the fully qualified path of the current working directory
member.returns: The fully qualified path of the current working directory

member.name: P:JoshSB.JoshSB.ComputerName
member.summary: Gets the NetBIOS name of this local computer
member.returns: The NetBIOS name of this local computer

member.name: P:JoshSB.JoshSB.CurrentDomain
member.summary: Gets the network domain name associated with the current user
member.returns: The network domain name associated with the current user

member.name: P:JoshSB.JoshSB.Uptime
member.summary: Gets the number of milliseconds elapsed since the system started
member.returns: The number of milliseconds elapsed since the system started
